message.content:
cs.CR, cs.OS, cs.DB, cs.SE, cs.DC 

The paper deals with the problem of secure data deletion on file systems, which is a topic that falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The specific file system that the paper focuses on is YAFFS, which is commonly used on Android smartphones, indicating a possible connection to operating systems (cs.OS). The paper also proposes three mechanisms for secure deletion, which could be considered as contributions to database systems (cs.DB) or software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the implementation and evaluation of these mechanisms on Nexus One smartphones involves performance analysis, which could be related to distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC).
